I don't care what is on that label, that's not linen.  That doesn't feel like linen. Nor does it act like linen. Linen is breathable as a fabric and this material keeps in one's body heat like polyester does. Whether it's a blend or not, I do not know nor am I deeply invested in finding out. But it's certainly not linen.  Colour is great, fit is whatever since it's literally a shapeless box of a shirt. I didn't get it to be shapely, lmao. I got it to be cool in the godforsaken heat. It doesn't do that.  2 stars for the killer hue and the fact that it is a shirt I can wear (eventually).
I actually got some compliments on this shirt.  Though I did remove the string.  It didn’t look right on me.  Just bought one in another color.

评论概述: You can take the strings off

decent material and good fit
Product looked good just get the size larger

评论概述: The fit is good and it is cute but...

I normally wear a size ladies 14-16 and and men's medium so I ordered the XL which was recommended by Amazon. It fit like a men's small at the most. Also, the fabric is a coarse cotton with no give and did not feel like it would be at all cool on a hot day. Disappointed. and returned.
The fit is nice, it looks as pictured. I marked a star off because it is a little scratchy.
Love how soft this thing is for the fabric it’s made out of. Glad I purchased it
This is more like paper than fabric it's cheap poorly made. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

评论概述: Small works well for lady with cheap corset!
评论详情: 5'6" ~116lbs Fits well with corset+belt combo, though sleeves are a bit large in the armpit and it would mess things up if I raise my arms too high (would have to readjust/pull down under corset). Nice tunic length to go with leggings. Material is light and cool. Will wear to the faire :)

评论概述: the size corresponds to the expected
评论详情: I got what I expected
Very comfortable not really breathable but it’s nice
Got the XL and it is form fitting, but good. Using for LARP.

I picked this out in blue for my husband's ren fair outfit. It fit nicely to size (I ordered his tshirt size) and was super comfortable. It was breathable enough to be comfortable all day. The cord is weirdly long, but he replaced it with leather cord.  I've washed it on cold, line-dried it, and it came out fine. It's better quality than we expected for the price.
Ran small
I’m traveling to a warm climate and this shirt is exactly what I needed - very stylish and light weight. The fit is perfect for my build. I would buy it again.
Color, fit and fabric as expected. Very happy
I returned it. It seemed to be made of paper. Okay if you were going to wear as pajamas.
Like everything. Disliked nothing. Going to order more.
Wore this for a Renaissance costume under a stuffy jacket and I was quite comfortable the whole time. Might wear it for other occasions!
Shirt fits great and is comfortable.

评论概述: good but not what i was expecting
评论详情: The lace-up detail on the front is a unique feature that adds a bohemian and hippie vibe to the shirt. It's a nice touch for those looking to express their individuality through their clothing.  However, there are a few aspects that could be improved. The fit of the shirt is not as expected; it runs a bit larger than standard sizing. I would recommend checking the size chart before purchasing to ensure a proper fit.  Additionally, the quality of the stitching is not as sturdy as I would have liked. After a few wears and washes, I noticed some loose threads, which could potentially affect the shirt's longevity.  While the shirt is advertised as suitable for yoga, the fabric's texture may not be ideal for intense physical activity. It's more suitable for casual and relaxed occasions.

评论概述: Cotton Linen shirts are GREAT!  Especially in the heat of the summer.
评论详情: 100/100  These really are great. I have lost a lot of weight over the past year and have replaced my entire wardrobe with cotton linen separates. I have been very happy with these and never looked back.  Don’t expect modern drip dry, these do wrinkle, but they hang and the wrinkles fall out leaving a very comfy garment behind. They also run a bit small . . . but easily handled, just order up from your measured size and you should have no problems.  Ultimately, is it worth the price? YES! Get several!

评论概述: Que se puede opinar si te gusto lo que ordenantes
评论详情: El estilo está bien el color un rosado serio está bien el estiló que más se puede pedir no es para andar de presumido es para tener una buena presentación.
Truly ugly
Nothing to write home about

This a different look for a guy that spends his days in an office environment and is anything but a hippie.  It is a fun look and it is light and comfortable.  Made for for relaxing rather than being active.

评论概述: Very pleasantly surprised by the quality
评论详情: I really like the lightweight texture of the shirt. It's perfect for what is already a hot blistering humid summer
Nice shirt.

评论概述: Not for me, but could work for a skinny cat!
评论详情: I am 511 and 250 pounds and this just does not look appealing on me. Plain and simple. I will wear it around the yard but nothing further. I think this is made for a smaller physique type of man, as the low-cut, V-neck is a little bit absurd. All in all good quality, but just not mine thing.

Feels cool like an all cotton loose t-shirt, maybe a little cooler. It's a nice looking shirt but I wish it was tumble dry and didn't require touching up with an iron, otherwise if not for those two things it would have garnered a 5.

评论概述: Love this shirt for casual beach days
评论详情: We are pretty lucky this year and will be on the beach for about three months in total.  This means that I need more beach wear than I've ever had in my life.  This shirt is great for a casual day on the beach but still enough for a casual dinner later that evening.  The material is soft and washes very well without getting a ton of wrinkles.  Seams are well made and don't have loose threads or stand out and make it itchy where it touches your skin.  The tie front is approved by my wife and the light blue color looks great on a tan. Definitely will be picking up this shirt in other colors.  Sizing runs true so you should be fine ordering your normal.
This a really cool, lightweight shirt that is perfect for summer.  I like it.
Washes well in cold water and hang dry. Very few wrinkles that way. No noticeable change in the fit after washing. The sleeves feel a little long for the style but I'll probably roll them.

评论概述: Exactly what I expected from the description
评论详情: Cotton linen is soft and comfy to wear. A really nice casual Shirt. The drawstring front brings up memories of a pirate shirt. A nice beach or casual vacation shirt. It's light-weight and keeps you cool in the heat.
Light weight breathable fabric. Front opening with ties is a cool feature. Sleeves are cuffed. Nicely stitched. Great summer shirt for casual wear. True to size chart.
made to the correct size as stated, fits great, feels well made
Not a basic beach wear but ones loved by hippies.  I love the color (cyan). Its bright and nice. And its really light and doesnt feel too hot. Overall a good wear.
At first glance out of the box, this shirt looked larger than ordered. It fits good once tried on, not a big fan of the shoe string tie.
The tie strings on the front aren't quite me. I don't go to Ren faires any more 😉 but I like the color, fit and feel.

I just received this shirt very recently and I am really happy with it. I have not worn it out yet, but I tried it on for friends and family and they said I look good in it. I think so too. The material is nice and soft, and the shirt seems to be well made. The fit is perfect, and the color is nice. I am really looking forward to wearing this shirt out this summer.  Here are some of my pros and cons of the shirt:  Pros:  Soft and comfortable material Well-made Perfect fit Nice color  Cons:  The shirt is a bit long, so it may not be ideal for people who are shorter The shirt is not wrinkle-free, so it will probably need to be ironed after washing  Overall, I am really happy with this shirt and I would definitely recommend it to others. It is a great option for a summer shirt that is both stylish and comfortable.

These are nice for summer, they’re light and breathable. The style is a little weird though, it looks like it was perfectly framed on the model but if you move you lose the look. The stitching is somewhat questionable.
This fits great and is great for my summer yoga classes.

This COOFANDY Men Linen Cotton Shirt Beach Lace Up V Neck Shirts Hippie Viking Meditation Tunic was absolutely outstanding with the khaki color. It had such a feng shui movement to it that I just loved the way that it looked on my husband, especially with the cross ropes on the chest. It definitely had a swagger and a feeling of walking through the park and not having a care in the world. Absolutely the feel that you need. It was soft but thick enough in texture to where you could feel the cotton breathe through and as well as the way it fits comfortably on the body without making the frame of your body feel misguided. I definitely know that he enjoyed it but like I said in my other previous ventures with men's clothes, sometimes they feel a lot more comfortable than a woman's clothes for the most part and this is one of them. Absolutely awesome.
Ready for Cancun, I like the material, I just have to match it with a good pair of pants, a collar, sunglasses and a hat.  It feels really comfortable and makes me feel good.

Time to revert to my youth and go "hippie!"  I really like the look and feel of this shirt.  Great for the beach, pool or just lounging around.  Cotton material keeps you cool on those hot days and you can leave the V-neck loose - adding to your "street cred" of being the coolest guy around!  Side notches on the hem keep the shirt from gathering around the waist when you're sitting down.  Laid back style in spades!

Love this shirt....I do renaissance festivals as a vendor so always needing new costuming.  This shirt is so different colored from most you see that it will be a great stand out part of my outfit.  It seems well made and the material soft so no problems wearing all day.....I'm very much looking forward to my next event in June to wear it out.

评论概述: Great looks, innovative design, and a true fit.
评论详情: Size: Small Color: Ice Green   The fit is as expected, and it is a true fit. In this particular shade of ice green, this lace-up V-neck shirt looks great.   The fabric is airy, breathable, and moisture-wicking. It is mentioned that the fabric is made of 80% cotton and 20% linen. But the fabric is not as smooth as can be expected for such a rich cotton-linen blend. For a pull-on shirt, some stretchability is expected, but it is missing any stretchability. Because of this, the wearing and removing of the shirt is not easy, and the durability is also affected.   Overall, it is a nice shirt.
Just received this linen shirt. The material is nice and soft. Not scratchy and like some linen material that feels hard and scratchy.

It's nice, pretty soft after washing, and pretty baggy for a comfy, lounge feel. The tag says it's 80 percent cotton, 20 percent linen, and like all linen it's going to be a bit wrinkly. That's part of its charm—this is for lounging, not for dressing to impress. It shrinks a little in the wash, but since it already had a baggy fit, that actually worked fine for me.

评论概述: Good shirt for around the house and yard
评论详情: I'm giving this four stars, instead of three, because I think it will suit some people better than it suits me.  The fabric is fairly decent. It's mostly comfortable, but it doesn't really drape nice on the body. The proportions of it seemed designed more for the Standard American Body (skinny shoulders, thin arms, big belly).  For me, it's just too billowy on the bottom which would be fine if it "flowed" better.  4 stars, but that's for the right people.

The material feels like cotton, great summer shirt. Uniform, pale hue and nice fabric texture, not the kind that would stay flat after ironing. Very well made, good craftsmanship. Definitely a shirt for days in the sun, but nice enough even as casual fit at the office, strikes a note of originality with the drawstring instead of the formal, usual collar.

评论概述: Wrinkly and can't be tumble dried
评论详情: This shirt looks pretty much as pictured, except that it does not come with the tie threaded through from the top, as shown in the pictures, so if you want that look, you’ll have to take it out and re-thread it yourself.  The fabric is slightly crinkly, but reasonably soft and comfortable. There is no stretch to the fabric. It’s thin, lightweight, a bit see-through, and looks a little cheap. The bottom edge is straight with about one-inch straight vents on both sides.  The washing instructions say to wash it only in cold water, and do NOT tumble dry. So you’ve gotta baby this thing. It arrived super wrinkly, so plan to have to iron it each time you wear it.  The sizing is fine, as expected, but anticipate a little shrinkage, and anticipate a LOT of shrinkage if you ignore the care instructions and machine dry it.  Overall, I like the shirt, and it’s okay, but not great.
its amazing quality and comfortable to wear everyday.
Loved the shirt on vacation
I love wearing Cotten when it’s hot outside. This shirt is very comfortable.

I ordered this for my son after going to our local Renaissance Faire for his cosplay outfit.  He was thrilled with the fit and feel of the shirt.  He now wants it in other colors.  We haven't washed it yet, but it's lose enough for him.  Looking forward to ordering more colors.
Good feeling light fabric, not very soft but absolutely breathable and stylish looking.
Nice casual looking

I ordered this shirt in a size Large and it fits just as I like it.  It did shrink just a little after washing in cold water and hanging to dry but it still fits comfortably.  I like the color I ordered and the shirt looks nice with jeans or even a dressier pant, like Khakis. As I said, it's comfortable to wear.
Stylish natural fivers shirts. Good for a nice weather. I will probably use it with my kilt on Renn Fests.
Got this to wear with a costume and am very pleased with it. The fit is fantastic and the material breathes very well.
This shirt is very loose and comfortable. The material used feels good and looks good.

I ordered the navy color and really like it. It's muted and more like a steely ocean blue than what I think of as navy blue. A medium usually fits me perfectly but this shirt was a little on the large side. I haven't washed it yet so it may shrink a bit, but when it arrived it was about an inch too big at the shoulders which then put the sleeves at my elbows. Even at the slightly large size I like it though.  One think that wasn't apparent from the pictures is that the rivets in the shirt are bright silver color. I'd have preferred black or bronze but the silver is okay. The tag says 80% cotton and 20% linen so it is all natural fiber. I've found some cases where the tag doesn't match the product information so it's good to see that confirmation of fabric right on the shirt.  All in all, I really like this shirt.

评论概述: Fits perfectly fine, but it arrived with a hole in the chest area
评论详情: Aside from the small hole, the tunic fits perfectly fine and is breathable.

评论概述: Really long and a bit too heavy for a summer shirt
评论详情: I usually rave about Coofandy’s line of menswear, but this beachy yoga shirt misses the mark a little. As the title of this review says, it is very long. The bottom hem hangs below my crotch and completely covers my butt. Because of this, you pretty much have to pair it with very long shorts or some pants. For a casual summertime shirt I was surprised by how heavy the fabric seems. I purchased it in navy and the dark color plus the weight of the fabric made being in the Florida sun a bit uncomfortably warm. I wouldn’t want to be outside all day while wearing it.  I like the v-neck with the tie and the shoulders fit perfectly. Realize, though, that this shirt is very roomy and not at all sheer, so if you were hoping that it may let you show off some muscle, you’re going to be very disappointed. I’m also not sure thin guys are ideal candidates for this cut. It would probably look pretty good on much beefier men than I am.  I truly do love the Coofandy brand and I hate to be negative about this shirt, but you can’t win them all. If the shirt shrinks to a non-comedic length after a few washes I’ll let you know. But until then I can’t say I would recommend it.

What I like or dislike about it is as follows: - Cotton material is ideal for a breathable and cool - It is my first time trying this "Hippie Yoga Boho Renaissance Tunic design," and I like it. It has a freestyle vibe to it. - I ordered black color; it is not blurred nor has any other defects. - My size is large, all my shirts are large, and they fit very well. I order a large, and it is perfect. - The black color absorbs heat much faster, so I should have known better. - I have a hairy chest, so I either have to shave it or wear a layer under it. - I feel more vulnerable to sunburn around my neck since this shirt cannot protect my skin.  Overall, I like the style and the fabric. There are some limitations to where and when wearing this shirt.
Not much to say about this shirt.  It looks good.  Fits well.  Seams to be well made.  Just a casual shirt.  I'll wear it for going to the beach, zoo, park, etc.  I'm happy with it.

I bought this to wear when I go to the pool. It's easy to slip on, even if I'm still a bit wet. I thought the strings dangled a bit too low for my liking, but you can just cut them off, or tie them in a knot like I did.  Put a little thought into the color you buy. I bought the light blue one and like it. But the first day I was wearing it, after talking to my dad for a few minutes, he said, "Ok, Doc, see you later" when he departed. And I thought to myself, he's right, if not for these strings hanging down this shirt looks somewhat like scrubs.

I really like the overall design of the shirt, it is different from other shirts I normally wear. It is lightweight and comfortable, perfect for a hot day, more specifically a beach day. I love the khaki color And the laces on the chest.

Put some style and swagger in your look. This shirt is soft, comfortable, and has a studly male style. The corded V-neck and subtle crepe material is a great look for Summer, and the band I am in dresses in black on stage, so this will be a great shirt for warmer weather performance.
Doesn't fit like a normal shirt it's very boxy and not natural looking. It didn't look good on me no matter what I tried so maybe it just wasn't for me.

Although the color is a beautiful light blue, the stitching was neat and well done, and there wasn’t any smells, this shirt ran very small. I ordered a medium and according to the measurements listed it should have fit large with extra fabric on me. But thru the chest, it was so tight I couldn’t even get it on. The measurements are way off.  The measurement chart definitely needs work! I can’t use this shirt at all, so be sure and size way up.

评论概述: Comfortable linen short sleeve quarter lace up shirt
评论详情: Look and feel of the COOFANDY Cotton Linen Shirt is casual and a good choice for a step up from a standard tee shirt for relaxed activewate.  Fabric breaths well and appears to be good quality.  Stitching is well done.  Fit is spot on for me.  Overall good choice.

评论概述: Cool shirt for summer, nice fit
评论详情: Got the gray color shirt. It's got a nice trim fit and good for casual settings. I would recommend to order one size up if you prefer a looser fit. The material is something that you probably need to get used to and easier when you wear it a few times. I have not washed it yet and have not tested if it shrinks. If you prefer a casual shirt fir the beach or by the pool, this is your shirt!

This linen shirt comes in a nice ziplock and vacuum sealed in plastic inside of that. The shirt itself is basically exactly as they show in their listing advertisement pictures. The tiny tag at the top of the shirt specifically says "Made In China" so where the listing says "Made in USA or Imported" should really just say that it is imported or made in China. There is another tag near the bottom that does say it is 80% cotton and 20% linen but also the tag in mine says it is XS. I don't know what gigantic XS this is but it does just fit as XL. I would say this is more in between L and XL so I would probably try a size up if I wanted to be a bit more comfortable as I like loose clothes. Overall, it's a nice shirt with seemingly no issues on any stitching or any production issues. If this is the kind of shirt you might like, order your exact size for a bit of a more fitted feel or one size up for a bit looser if mine is the example to go off of.
Very nice beach blouse. The baby blue looks very nice and the material is breathable. Great for a day out.

This definitely has a ren faire, pirate-y vibe to it. It's made from a real nice linen material though, so it's quite breathable. The fit is on the slim side at the stomach and waist, so if you've got some extra, you might want to order a size up. I also found it looked better if I rolled the sleeves up - the short sleeves are all the way down to my elbow, and rolling them up gave it a more masculine look, instead of looking like the dentist on a pirate ship.
